mods.note: ; : â€”v* No : / of 1907. British Residency and Consulate-Creneral, ,/t Bushire, /ID June 1907. # To The Political Agent, MUSCAT. Sir, I have the honour to acknowledge with thanks the receipt of the Administration Report for the year 1906-1907 which formed an enclosure to your letter No: 269 dated 27th May 1907. 2. In this connection please let me know whether the printed copy of the Administration Report of this Residency for the year 1905-1906 forwarded to you with this office Confidential letter No: 327 dated 21st April 1907, has been duly received by you. I have the honour to be Sir, Your most obedient servant. Political ft 2 . C* Major, Resident in the Persian Gulf.

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 23; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file consists of correspondence concerning the Muscat Administration Report for the year 1906-07 and contains a handwritten copy of the report.The file features the following principal correspondents: the Political Agent and Consul, Muscat; the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf.
